definitions.definition: A mythical semidivine hero , the son of Peleus by the nereid Thetis , and prince of the Myrmidons , who features in the Iliad as a central character and the foremost warrior of the Achaean (Greek) camp.
A male given name from Ancient Greek .
The Greek camp Trojan asteroid 588 Achilles .

main_definition: ( Greek mythology ) A mythical semidivine hero , the son of Peleus by the nereid Thetis , and prince of the Myrmidons , who features in the Iliad as a central character and the foremost warrior of the Achaean (Greek) camp.
secondary_definitions: ( rare ) A male given name from Ancient Greek .
( astronomy ) The Greek camp Trojan asteroid 588 Achilles .
